summary.blockquote: WARNINGWarning: This feature has been removed. Please fix your websites and applications.

remarks.para: This method was removed in Chrome 43 and Firefox 56.

The Window.showModalDialog()
created and displayed a modal dialog box containing a specified HTML document.

-dialog, a replacement for window.showModalDialog().
-showModalDialog Polyfill
using a dialog and generators

WindowShowModalDialog.returns: Holds the returnValue property as set by the document specified by uri.
